PersonalStatement.text: Jenny Johnson, born on 1968-10-18, is a Male based in West Angelaport, Solomon Islands. He is Married and holds Cameroonian nationality. Currently working at Sutton-Ho.

WorkExperience.text: Research Scientist at Hill Group from 2007 to 2017.
Senior Software Developer at Sutton-Ho, 2017 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Business Administration from University of Notre Dame
Master's in Engineering from University of Peradeniya

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys hiking.
